ygData.subject: More from the bearer of good news...
ygData.msgSnippet: We just completed the Darkforge boots quest. 9AC 3STA Equal to Rubi in every way shape and form. Color Red. Though upon closer inspection of both the bracer
ygData.messageBody:
We just completed the Darkforge boots quest.

9AC
3STA

Equal to Rubi in every way shape and form.

Color Red.

Though upon closer inspection of both the bracer and
boots, they are a little bit darker red than the rubi.
One was on a human..the other a troll. So anyone
thinking that they were escaping the dreaded red armor
due to their race can stop hoping.

This is leading me to believe that i was misinformed
as to the color of the BP. The inventory graphic was
probably black, as are the boots, so he may have
assumed that it was black when put on. I dont know.
Eventually someone will get it and we'll know for
sure.
The bracer's inventory graphic looks like banded.

Now as to why they are filling us up with STA stats, i
dont know. Maybe there were complaints that we dont
have as many HPs as warriors?.. whatever. Im just
disappointed again with the boots. One of the pieces i
was actually looking forward to.
Maybe i will go get the DW boots after all.


Sweet dreams

=====
